content: Combat sport events in 2022 ***ONE: Only the Brave*** was a [Combat sport](/wiki/Combat_sport) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on January 28, 2022, at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background The main event was set to feature an interim Heavyweight title fight between the Russian Anatoly Malykhin and the Belarusian Kiril Grishenko was expected to take place at the event. However, the bout was moved to this event ONE: Bad Blood due to Malykhin tested positive for COVID-19 days before the event. The event also featured the semi-finals for the [ONE Kickboxing Featherweight Grand Prix](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship#ONE_Kickboxing_Featherweight_Grand_Prix_bracket). [Françesco Xhaja](/wiki/Fran%C3%A7esco_Xhaja) made his promotional debut against the veteran Rade Opacic. A Lightweight bout between [Zhang Lipeng](/wiki/Zhang_Lipeng) and Ruslan Emilbek Uulu was scheduled for the event. A featherweight bout between Kim Jae Woong and [Tang Kai](/wiki/Tang_Kai) was expected to take place at this event.
